notesStmt.note: Folios - smaller (octavo) leaves, containing quotations from Ḥesheḳ Shelomoh, with references to the pages of the manuscript. This part was probably added in the 17th century. Boniforte Assinar, inscribed with his name, folio 365v. Hieron Carolus, inscribed with his name and a date of 1582, folio 365v.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A commentary on the Song of Songs by Yohanan Allemanno.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian cursive script, unpunctuated, of 16th century. Ya῾aḳov ben Mordekhai Foetti: inscribed in the colophon, folio 365v.

binding.p: Post-1600; red and brown gold-tooled leather. Spine: 'Heshek Shelomoh. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental Ms. 2854.'
